${user_nick}$
You're finally here...

$Gaharam$
So you have finally witnessed everything.

${user_nick}$
Gaharam, just what do you want from me? Why is this destiny? Why??

$Gaharam${sound:npc_Gaharam_9444_qu_01.ogg}
I am only fulfilling my duties. Our meeting was foretold in a dream, so I guided you.
I believed you were our saviour.

${user_nick}$
A saviour?! I saved no one.
What's the use if I couldn't do anything?!
What happened to Argenta?!

$Gaharam$
...History has yet to reach that point.

${user_nick}$
What does that mean... You don't know?

$Gaharam${sound:npc_Gaharam_9444_qu_02.ogg}
What I can tell you for sure is that the door opened twice and closed twice as you have seen for yourself.

$Gaharam${sound:npc_Gaharam_9444_qu_03.ogg}
The first to close the door was the seal stone created from the sacrifice of the Ancients combined with the Silver Dragon's power.

$Gaharam${sound:npc_Gaharam_9444_qu_04.ogg}
The second was a human who has overcome being a human.
The strong king who can kill anyone including himself for what he believes in.

${user_nick}$
How could the door open for the second time when the seal stone was still intact?
How come Argenta wasn't around at that time?

$Gaharam$
The seal stone only seals the door from Verathea. It does not bar is closed from Mistland. If Vestinel's creation reaches out to open the Monolith, the seal stone wouldn't be able to stop that.
Because the seal stone was made solely from Goddess Altea's fragments.

$Gaharam$
What the seal stone does is to prevent anyone from this world from opening the Monolith.
And notifying the owner when the door is open.

$Gaharam$
I don't know tentang the Silver Dragon. Goddess's dreams do not show everything tentang her.

${user_nick}$
What?!

$Gaharam$
I can show you the story of the ones who closed the door the second time if you wish...
But it is up to you whether you want to see it. This memory is not necessarily included in the twisted history of destiny.

$Gaharam${sound:npc_Gaharam_9444_qu_05.ogg}
I know it has been hard on you. You must have been tormented by many memories.
So I am in no position to force you to see this.
This is the last memory you will see if you choose to view it.

${user_nick}$
...I will go. I have to find out what happened at the end.

$Gaharam$
...Alright. Please Pergilah ke Praying Heart now.
You will meet them... and...

${user_nick}$
And?

$Gaharam${sound:npc_Gaharam_9444_qu_06.ogg}
...Nevermind. Please be on your way now....
(Pergilah ke the Praying Heart)


*You cannot proceed in a party.

$Archer Meriendel$
I made a promise... Please Feder, please rise from your despair....
(Seems like you can't talk to her. Listen to what Feder has to say)

$Feder$
...You can't persuade me, Meriendel. You are not looking at the root of the problem!
(Listen to what Feder has to say)

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_01.ogg}
You're right. This world is nothing but a dream to the Goddess and I have forgotten tentang that. She regards us as mere mirages like how we view our own dreams.

$Archer Meriendel$
Feder...

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_02.ogg}
But I exist here. Same for all the other lives in this world. It may be a mere dream to the Goddess, but this is reality for us! That was the truth I've been holding onto all these years...

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_03.ogg}
I heard the screams of those who suddenly lost their loved ones. This world is turning into chaos. Soon, the time of endless fear and anguish will come.

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_04.ogg}
So this is what I've been striving for all these years? This world I've strived to conquer has less substance than the shadows! Did the Goddess create us merely to taunt us with the futility of our own existence?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_01.ogg}
No Feder...It's not like that! We're blessed by the Goddess. No matter what's happening now, that hasn't changed!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_05.ogg}
She's bestowed upon us Her blessing, has She? It is Her blessing that we should turn to ash? She can keep Her blessing. I want no part of it!

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_02.ogg}
Feder, please don't give up! Things won't disappear if we manage to close the Monolith! The adventurer you saw last time is the proof of it!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_06.ogg}
Close it? But what if it opens again? If a creature from Mistland opens the Monolith again, are we to repeat the same tragedy over and over again?! I can't accept this!

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_03.ogg}
Feder...?
(Meriendel's eyes widen in surprise and fear)
What are you trying to do...?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_07.ogg}
Go, Meriendel. Our paths will cross no more. I will not stop you.
I will stop the tragedy even by doing what everyone in the world fears the most.

$Archer Meriendel$
Something feared by everyone?
You know I won't leave you, yet you're telling me to leave. What are you planning?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_08.ogg}
If the Goddess ignores us to our doom, I will see that she is doomed too! Every living thing has a life in this world!

$Feder$
I may be able to meet her by entering the Monolith since it is open. I will go and kill her and become the owner of this world! This world shall never have to perish with its new owner!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_09.ogg}
I will change all the rules, and become the God myself!

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_04.ogg}
Feder...!!
Do you even realize what you're saying? You're trying to become a God??

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_10.ogg}
If this world has a problem, it has to be fixed. Don't you think so, Meriendel?
I can't ignore the wrongs I've witnessed as the king of this world. I will destroy the evil, even if it is God!
But you don't understand me. You can choose to leave. I don't need an ally who doubts me.

$Archer Meriendel$
...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_05.ogg}
No...I'll follow you to the end, Feder.
That's what I promised myself to do, and...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_07.ogg}
Even if we believe in different things, I can't give up on you.
I made a promise and...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_08.ogg}
I...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_09.ogg}
I... think you're strong.
I have a duty to watch over you and stop you from evil.
(Meriendel seems to have swallowed the words she initially wanted to say)

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_11.ogg}
You're still a fool... Do as you wish.

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_12.ogg}
Hurry, the Monolith is just up ahead. Soon we will have company.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9444_qu_10.ogg}
Yes, my king.

${user_nick}$
...(Nothing an be heard anymore but stay until the end...)

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_01.ogg}
What? AGAIN...?!
I’m speechless.
(Argenta stares blankly and the Monolith's door which is open. It seems like she can't see you...)

$Argenta$
And this time, it's the Mistland creature that opened it, since the seal stone is still there. Are the monsters from Mistland starting to launch an attack on us? That's so irritating. I haven't seen them before and I don't want to see them in the future too.

$Argenta$
I have no choice. The first time it was closed with the sacrifices of the humans. I guess it's time for my sacrifice this time. Maybe I should just go over to Mistland and close it from there. Ah... so this is how it all ends.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_02.ogg}
I admit that it's my fault. I should have just stayed here and kept my eye on the Monolith. Why did I even bother to try fixing this broken world?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_03.ogg}
...Phew. So my life ends like this.
(Argenta adjusts her grip on her sword)

$Argenta$
...?

$Argenta$
...?? What is this energy? Isn't this... Chaos Dragon??

$Argenta$
What are you....? A human? A dragon?
(She can't see you. Listen to what Feder has to say)

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_13.ogg}
Keke...
(He can't see you. Listen to what Feder has to say.)

$Feder$
Keke...

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_04.ogg}
You're not the Red Dragon. You're the human king, the one they call The Conqueror?
What are you doing here?

$Feder$
Keke... Is the Monolith closed?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_14.ogg}
Are you a dragon too? Another... Chaos?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_06.ogg}
Sorry to disappoint you but I'm Ancient Dragon. Tell me, what's going on, human? The Red Dragon was here a moment ago.
What happened to the Red Dragon?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_15.ogg}
If you're asking tentang Rubinart, it is dead.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_07.ogg}
Why were you with the Red Dragon, and how did you appear from the other side of the door? What are you?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_16.ogg}
I'm what you can see for yourself now.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_08.ogg}
Did Chaos Dragon close the Monolith? Hah! And you returned to Verathea with his jewel in you. Did he leave you with the jewel before he died?

$Feder$
(Feder stays silent but he looks like he is in terrible pain)

$Argenta$
(She observes Feder for a while then lowers her weapon with a sigh)

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_09.ogg}
Human, you'll die soon. That jewel will gnaw on your body and make you something that you're not. Rubinart has left you with a terrible curse. It's not something I can help you with.

$Feder$
I see.
(Feder clenches his teeth)

$Argenta$
The only thing I can do is to give you a quick death when the jewel has ruined you.

$Argenta$
Get out of the Monolith. I don't know how Rubinart lured you in here, but I need to calm the seal stone down. If you stay, you may die in the process.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9444_qu_10.ogg}
I should start with the Abyss of Heat.
Farewell, human.

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_17.ogg}
Krrgh! Kehe... Hehehe....

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_18.ogg}
Hahaha! How amusing! I could have become stronger!
Goddess, were you appalled by the rebellion of your creation?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_19.ogg}
Meriendel, I've kept my promise. The door is now closed! The world will have more time thanks to you.
This is the last I could do for you for our friendship.
But you don't exist anymore.

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_20.ogg}
Rubinart, you foolish dragon. You have made the wrong choice in the end.
But I've returned to this futile world. Look at it! Living on as though nothing happened when it barely escaped destruction!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_21.ogg}
I will make my way again to the Gods. I will do whatever I can.
I will destroy this world and create a new one! I will regain my power and open the Monolith again!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_22.ogg}
Hahaha! Hahahahaha!

${user_nick}$
Feder...?!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_23.ogg}
Oh it's you. The one who travels in time. Why do you look so shocked?

${user_nick}$
Feder, did you... meet the Goddess?!
But why would you destroy this world!! You're a king!!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_24.ogg}
Open your eyes. Do you choose to live in a world where everything you do is futile, or a world where your actions count?
Those with power need to be responsible. You have the right to rebuild this world too!

${user_nick}$
The Chaos Dragon gave me this power so I could protect everyone. There's no way I would ever join you. I'm going to save the world no matter what!

$Feder$
What a fool! Do you realize what you're saying, adventurer?
You're trying to protect delusion and futility! Don't you understand?
You will disappear like you've never existed before if the world doesn't change!

$Feder$
The Goddess has deceived us, and this world is nothing but a device she uses to do that.
Am I wrong to want to meet the Goddess using her own device?

${user_nick}$
But what's the use of denying this world?!
In the end, aren't you fighting so that everyone in the world can live on?
I'm sure Meriendel wouldn't want this too!

$Feder$
Meriendel...?
Hahaha! She was the first to become distorted and die in the Monolith. What can she say tentang this? That's the ending for a fool who tried to follow her Telesia.

${user_nick}$
What?!!? Meriendel is... dead?!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_25.ogg}
She died in vain. Our lives mean nothing to the Goddess! Am I so wrong for seeking to change that? She won't even realize it when part of her dream is gone!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_26.ogg}
I will ask for one last time. Won't you join me to create a new world? Or will you try to stop me and die right here?

${user_nick}$
I will stop you. And I won't die here!
I will never understand or agree that destroying this world to create a new world is the right thing to do!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9444_qu_27.ogg}
You fool...!

${user_nick}$
...!!

${user_nick}$
What's happening...
Feder and Meriendel... the Red Dragon... Argenta... the door was closed from Mistland?

${user_nick}$
Oh Meriendel... are you gone? You said you would save this world with Feder...

${user_nick}$
Meriendel...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

${user_nick}$
(It's hard to understand everything you just saw. Did Red Dragon Rubinart really close the Monolith? Kembali ke Gaharam.)
